titles.title: Grandchild Care Tax Relief Act of 2000

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit to grandparents who provide primary child care services without compensation for their grandchildren who are not their dependents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/30/2000--Introduced. Amend the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $500 refundable credit for each grandchild to grandparents who provide primary child care services without compensation for their grandchildren who are not their dependents.
